suggest.predis/predis: Required to use the Redis storage engine
suggest.thobbs/phpcassa: Required to use the Cassandra storage engine
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: ~2.8 is required to use the DynamoDB storage engine
suggest.phpseclib/phpseclib: ~2.0 is required to use JWT features
suggest.spomky-labs/jose-service: Alternative JWT lib which support encryption (~0.1 is needed)
